pages.text: Wo zhengjiule ta he yu ta tongchuan de ren, wo yi na wei quan shijie de yige jixiang.
(Wo que yi paiqian) yi bo la xin, dangri, ta dui ta de zongzu shuo:`Nimen yingdang chongbai zhen zhu, bing dang jingwei ta, zhe duiyu nimen shi geng hao de. Ruguo nimen zhidao.

Chu zhenzhu wai, nimen zhi chongbai ouxiang, nimen zhi niezao wangyan. Nimen she zhenzhu er chongbai de (ouxiang), buneng zhuchi nimen de jiyang, suoyi, nimen yingdang dao zhenzhu nali xunqiu jiyang, nimen yingdang chongbai ta, nimen yingdang ganxie ta, nimen zhi bei zhao gui ta.
Ruguo nimen fouren (wo), namo, zai nimen zhiqian de xuduo minzu, ye fourenguo (tamen de shizhe). Shizhe de zeren zhishi mingbai di chuanda.'
Nandao tamen meiyou kanjian zhenzhu zenyang chuangzao zhongsheng, ranhou shi tamen fuhuo ma? Zhe duiyu zhenzhu shi rongyi de.
Ni shuo:`Nimen yingdang zai da dishang luxing, yin'er guancha zhenzhu zenyang chuangzao zhongsheng, you zenyang zaizao tamen. Zhenzhu duiyu wanshi que shi quanneng de.
Ta chengfa tasuo yiyu zhe, lianxu tasuo yiyu zhe, nimen zhi bei zhao guiyu ta.
Nimen wulun zai dishang huo tianshang, dou buneng taobi tianqian, chu zhenzhu wai, nimen meiyou renhe jianhu zhe, ye meiyou renhe yuanzhu zhe.'
Buxin zhenzhu de jixiang ji yu zhenzhu huijian de, zhe deng ren, dui wo de enhui yi juewangle, zhe deng ren, jiang shou tongku de xingfa.
